Parable.title: The Hidden Gold Blossom
Parable.Summary: An allegory of inner spiritual flowering concealed within alchemical practice, revealed through symbolic dialogue.

Parable.title: The Adam and Eva Parable in the Fire Garden
Parable.Summary: The purification of Adam and Eve through fire, symbolic of spiritual death and divine reunification.

Parable.title: The Book in the Lead Box
Parable.Summary: A sealed leaden book opened only through divine insight; contains a poem and symbolic figure.

Parable.title: The Ruby Child and the Black Raven
Parable.Summary: From corruption to transmutation; a red child is born after the raven’s blackening.

Parable.title: Symbolum Saturni — The Fall and Redemption Cycle
Parable.Summary: Begins with shame and ends in purified resurrection, a complete inner transformation cycle.

Parable.title: The Seven Strikes of Adam
Parable.Summary: Adam suffers seven spiritual trials, releasing essence and achieving symbolic union.

Parable.title: Dialogue of the Old and Young Student
Parable.Summary: A Socratic dialogue that emphasizes patience and humility on the path to true wisdom.

Parable.title: The Flaming Sword at the Garden Gate
Parable.Summary: The loss and guarded return to divine innocence, requiring purification by fire.

Parable.title: Hermetic Recital from the Emerald Tablet
Parable.Summary: Symbolic recitation of cosmic principles: unity, reflection, and spiritual manifestation.
